person.persName: David P. Allison (Hickman County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Hickman County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Mary Allison. Father of Harriet Allison Vaughn, Elbert W. Allison, Sarah M. Allison Shelton, John C. Allison, Mary B. Allison, Julian A. Allison, Charles C. Allison, Samuel B. Allison. Farmer in Hickman County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned three enslaved persons in Hickman County in 1850. Farmer in Hickman County in 1860. Owned four enslaved persons in Hickman County in 1860.
